metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000247 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
mpg123 memory overread

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpg123-0 - 1.16.0-1ubuntu1.1
mpg123 - 1.16.0-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.16.0-1ubuntu1.1').
